messages.title: Martin Whitfield is stronger for East Lothian
messages.content: Since being elected, I've always put East Lothian first. If re-elected, I will keep my promise to oppose independence and a no-deal Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Oppose a no-deal Brexit as it would be catastrophic for the economy.
Advocate for a strong and successful union between Scotland and the UK.
Pledge to fight for local services like the NHS and better local transport.
Oppose welfare cuts and want a fair system for everyone in need.

issues.economy: Oppose a no-deal Brexit as it would be catastrophic for the economy.
issues.health: Defend local services like the NHS.
issues.transport: Better local transport – Improve local facilities for everyone in East Lothian.
issues.socialWelfare: Oppose welfare cuts and want a fair system for everyone in need.

community.content: Defend local services like the NHS and better local transport.

endorsements.endorsement: Martin has been an outstanding local MP and is campaigning on the issues that matter to East Lothian. He has fought against SNP’s austerity, for better local services, and has made a difference for the people of East Lothian.

quotes.text: Martin has been an outstanding local MP and is campaigning on the issues that matter to East Lothian.

examples: Since being elected, I've always put East Lothian first.
Being East Lothian's MP is a huge honour and privilege.
2017 - I promise to be a strong local voice.
He campaigned for free TV licenses for over 75s and for an end to unfair gas and electricity standing charges.
I will keep my promise to oppose independence and a no-deal Brexit.
Defend local services like the NHS.
Better local transport – Improve local facilities for everyone in East Lothian.
Being East Lothian's MP is a huge honour and privilege.
Oppose a no-deal Brexit as it would be catastrophic for the economy.
Support the union – Advocate for a strong and successful union between Scotland and the UK.

personalStories.story: Being East Lothian's MP is a huge honour and privilege.

examples: Oppose a no-deal Brexit as it would be catastrophic for the economy.
Martin believes that it is best for East Lothian and best for Scotland, that we remain part of the United Kingdom.

examples: Being East Lothian's MP is a huge honour and privilege.
